artist: Painter: After Joachim Sandrart; Engraver: Theodor Matham; Publisher: Cornelis Dankertz
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: IOOST VANDE VONDEL / I. Sandrart/ Delineavit/ 6 lines of German/ Theod: Mathan sculp / C. Dankertz exc. | on sheet in pencil: 2-34 | on verso in pencil 2/f / Leith / Feb. 4/ 1840 | on mount below image in pencil: H. XI.260.151.iii/iv  W.58
life_date: After Joachim Sandrart, Painter, German, 1606–1688; Theodor Matham, Engraver, Dutch, 1606–1676; Cornelis Dankertz, Publisher, Dutch, 1603–1656
title: Portrait of Joost vande Vondel
